resources.string: ExpandableTextView is an Android library which allows us to easily create a TextView which can expand/collapse when user clicks on it .we can use this feature in many apps such as movie review app or storytelling app and in many other apps. A sample GIF is given below to get an idea about what we are going to do in this article. Note that we are going to implement this project using the Java language. ExpandableTextView is an Android library which allows us to easily create a TextView which can expand/collapse when user clicks on it .we can use this feature in many apps such as movie review app or storytelling app and in many other apps. A sample GIF is given below to get an idea about what we are going to do in this article. Note that we are going to implement this project using the Java language.
